name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_41Ar
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Ar" means the element "argon" and "41Ar" is the isotope "argon-41" with a half-life of 7.64e-02 days.
